result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
